pkgmetadata.longdescription: CSV Lexer for Pygments===================<!-- https://imgur.com/VADHMMY.png -->![CSV lexer in “pygmentize -L” list](https://imgur.com/Xf3tRh0.png)A simple, custom [CSV lexer](http://pygments.org/docs/lexerdevelopment/) for the [Pygments syntax highlighter](http://pygments.org/).![CSV lexer demonstration](https://imgur.com/g8TtkgW.png)The code is originally based on [this StackOverflow answer](https://stackoverflow.com/a/25508711/298171). The project, in its current incarnation, is a fork of [this repo here](https://github.com/Kristinita/PygmentsCSVLexer).
